alert.note: Alert for Ballard; McCracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 5:18PM EDT until July 02 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pulaski County in southern Illinois... West central Massac County in southern Illinois... Southeastern Alexander County in southern Illinois... Ballard County in western Kentucky... McCracken County in western Kentucky... Northeastern Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 418 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mound City, or near Cairo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paducah, Metropolis, Cairo, La Center, Wickliffe, Lone Oak, Mounds, Barlow, Mound City, Barkley Regional Airport, West Paducah, Lovelaceville, Kevil, Joppa, Olmsted, New Grand Chain and Blandville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 7. Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 29 and 30. Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 5 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
